name: SD Gundam Generation: Colony Kakutouki
overview: SD Gundam Generation: Colony Kakutouki ("SD Gundam Generation: Colony Fighting Record") is a licensed strategy game for the Super Famicom. It draws its conflicts and characters from the Mobile Fighter G Gundam series. It is the final game of six SD Gundam Generation games released for the Sufami Turbo peripheral, which uses smaller carts that are able to communicate with each other when placed in the Sufami Turbo device.
